ACTIVITY.TITLE: Activity
ACTIVITY.SUBTITLE: ACL Placement

STEP.DESCRIPTION:
Select the best location to place the ACL for the given scenario and decide if it is going to be inbound or an outbound ACL.
Scenario:
You are using a standard access list and you want to block all users from the 172.16.1.0 network from accessing the 192.168.1.96 network.
When done, click the Check button.

Scenario:
You are using a standard access list and you want to block all users from the 172.16.0.0/16 network from accessing the 192.168.1.32/27 network.
When done, click the Check button.

Scenario:
You are using a extended access list and you want to block all users from the 192.168.1.96/27 network from accessing the 192.168.1.32/27 network.
When done, click the Check button.

Scenario:
You are using a extended access list and you want to block all users from the 192.168.1.0/24 network from accessing the 172.16.1.0/24 network.
When done, click the Check button.

Scenario:
You are using a extended access list and you want to block all users from the 172.16.0.0/16 network from accessing the 192.168.1.32/27 network.
When done, click the Check button.
